languages.text: "Однажды моя проповедь поселила зерно веры в сердце другого Вольного Торговца — Инцендии Чорда. Может быть, тебе суждено быть вторым моим птенцом".

traits.locale_text: "Однажды моя проповедь поселила зерно веры в сердце другого Вольного Торговца — Инцендии Чорда. Может быть, тебе суждено быть вторым моим птенцом".

languages.text: "My sermon planted the seed of faith in the heart of another Rogue Trader once — Incendia Chorda. Perhaps you are destined to become my second fledgling."
languages.original_text: "Однажды моя проповедь поселила зерно веры в сердце другого Вольного Торговца — Инцендии Чорда. Может быть, тебе суждено быть вторым моим птенцом".

traits.locale_text: "Once, my sermon planted the seed of faith in the heart of another Rogue Trader — Incendia Chorda. Perhaps you are destined to become my second fledgling."
"Once, my sermon planted the seed of faith in the heart of another Rogue Trader — Incendia Chorda. Perhaps you are destined to become my second fledgling."
"My sermon planted the seed of faith in the heart of another Rogue Trader once — Incendia Chorda. Perhaps you are destined to become my second fledgling."
"My sermon planted the seed of faith in the heart of another Rogue Trader once — Incendia Chorda. Perhaps you are destined to become my second fledgling."
"My sermon planted the seed of faith in the heart of another Rogue Trader once — Incendia Chorda. Perhaps you are destined to become my second fledgling."

languages.text: “我的布道曾在另一位行商浪人心中播下了信仰的种子，那个人叫因森蒂娅·库尔达。或许，你会成为我的第二只雏鸟。”
languages.original_text: "My sermon planted the seed of faith in the heart of another Rogue Trader once — Incendia Chorda. Perhaps you are destined to become my second fledgling."

traits.locale_text: “我的布道曾在另一位行商浪人心中播下了信仰的种子，那个人叫因森蒂娅·库尔达。或许，你会成为我的第二只雏鸟。”

languages.text: «Mi sermón plantó la semilla de la fe en el corazón de otra Comerciante Independiente: Incendia Chorda. Quizá su destino pase por convertirse en mi segund{mf|o|a} discípul{mf|o|a}».
languages.original_text: "My sermon planted the seed of faith in the heart of another Rogue Trader once — Incendia Chorda. Perhaps you are destined to become my second fledgling."

traits.locale_text: «Mi sermón plantó la semilla de la fe en el corazón de otra Comerciante Independiente: Incendia Chorda. Quizá su destino pase por convertirse en mi segund{mf|o|a} discípul{mf|o|a}».

languages.text: 「私の説教は、かつてもうひとりの自由開拓者、インセンディア・チョーダの心に信仰の種を蒔きました。おそらくあなたは、ふたつ目の芽となる運命にあるのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "My sermon planted the seed of faith in the heart of another Rogue Trader once — Incendia Chorda. Perhaps you are destined to become my second fledgling."

traits.locale_text: 「私の説教は、かつてもうひとりの自由開拓者、インセンディア・チョーダの心に信仰の種を蒔きました。おそらくあなたは、ふたつ目の芽となる運命にあるのでしょう」

languages.text: "Meine Predigt pflanzte einst einer anderen Freihändlerin die Saat des Glaubens ein – Incendia Chorda. Vielleicht ist es Euer Schicksal, mein zweites Küken zu werden."
languages.original_text: "My sermon planted the seed of faith in the heart of another Rogue Trader once — Incendia Chorda. Perhaps you are destined to become my second fledgling."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Predigt pflanzte einst einer anderen Freihändlerin die Saat des Glaubens ein – Incendia Chorda. Vielleicht ist es Euer Schicksal, mein zweites Küken zu werden."

languages.text: « Mon sermon a déjà planté la graine de la foi dans le cœur d'une autre libre-marchande par le passé : Incendia Chorda. Je ferai peut-être de vous mon nouvel oisillon. »
languages.original_text: "My sermon planted the seed of faith in the heart of another Rogue Trader once — Incendia Chorda. Perhaps you are destined to become my second fledgling."

traits.locale_text: « Mon sermon a déjà planté la graine de la foi dans le cœur d'une autre libre-marchande par le passé : Incendia Chorda. Je ferai peut-être de vous mon nouvel oisillon. »

languages.text: "Bir zamanlar nutuklarım, bir başka Hür Tacir olan İncendia Chorda'nın kalbine inanç tohumları ekmişti. Belki kaderinde ikinci talebem olmak vardır."
languages.original_text: "My sermon planted the seed of faith in the heart of another Rogue Trader once — Incendia Chorda. Perhaps you are destined to become my second fledgling."

traits.locale_text: "Söylevim bir zamanlar bir başka Hür Tacir'in, İncendia Chorda'nın kalbine inanç tohumları ekmeyi başarmıştı. Belki de senin de kaderinde ikinci öğrencim olmak vardır."
